description:
In this course, our goal is to take a DECA newbie and train them to become proficient in the world of competition. We will do so through background knowledge in the form of Business Adminstration Core Performance Indicators, practice questions, and sample case studies taken directly from previous DECA competitions. At the very end, students will be provided with links to access more DECA resources for personal practice use one they are finished with the course. This course will benefit DECA members of any level and can only improve your ability to compete.

This Course Includes:

  • Introductory Information About DECA
  • Review of all 320 Business Adminstration Core Performance Indicators
  • Special Tips for Competitive Events
title: Intro to Business Administration for DECA
